Leech Enchantment

Description

The Leech enchantment has a chance to heal the wielder for a portion of the damage dealt when hitting an enemy. This creates a sustain mechanic for melee combat.

Mechanics

- Heals the wielder for a percentage of damage dealt - The healing amount is based on the weapon's level - Higher-level weapons provide more healing - Works with both physical and magical damage

Source Code

- Java: Leech.java - The effect is applied in the proc() method with healing amount scaling with weapon level

See Also

- Enchantments - List of all weapon enchantments - Weapons - Equipment that can have enchantments - Healing - General information about healing in the game
